/*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- 개체 이름 : HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_ALARM
-- 만든 날짜 : 2013-06-10 오전 8:06:47
-- 마지막으로 수정한 날짜 : 2013-06-12 오후 5:05:39
-- 상태 : VALID
------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
DROP TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_ALARM CASCADE CONSTRAINTS;

CREATE TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_ALARM (
  ID            VARCHAR2(64)      NOT NULL, 
  ALARM_TYPE    VARCHAR2(2)           NULL, 
  PRD_DATE      VARCHAR2(8)           NULL, 
  SHIFT         VARCHAR2(1)           NULL, 
  ROUTING       VARCHAR2(5)           NULL, 
  ST_NO         VARCHAR2(3)           NULL, 
  P_CODE        VARCHAR2(3)           NULL, 
  TOTAL         NUMBER(38)            NULL, 
  FIRST         NUMBER(38)            NULL, 
  REJECT        NUMBER(38)            NULL, 
  ERR_CODE      VARCHAR2(4)           NULL, 
  ERR_CNT       NUMBER                NULL, 
  INT_NO        VARCHAR2(12)          NULL, 
  SRL_NO        VARCHAR2(4)           NULL, 
  COMMENTS      VARCHAR2(100)         NULL, 
  ACTDTTM       VARCHAR2(30)          NULL, 
  PROG_ID       VARCHAR2(30)          NULL, 
  UPLOAD_YN     VARCHAR2(2)           NULL
)
TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT
PCTFREE 10
PCTUSED 0
INITRANS 1
MAXTRANS 255
STORAGE (
    INITIAL 64 K
    NEXT 1024 K
    MINEXTENTS 1
    MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
)
LOGGING
NOCACHE
MONITORING
NOPARALLEL
;

ALTER TABLE HVCCD_MES.INF_PMS_ALARM ADD
(
    PRIMARY KEY ( ID )
        USING INDEX
        TABLESPACE HVCCD_MES_DAT 
        PCTFREE 10
        INITRANS 2
        MAXTRANS 255
        STORAGE (
            INITIAL 64 K
            NEXT 1024 K
            MINEXTENTS 1
            MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED
        )
);
